alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Barbour County through 1045 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Texasville, or 8 miles northeast of Clio, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eufaula, Clio, Clayton, Louisville, Gaino, Osco, Texasville, Richards Crossroads, White Oak, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Millers Ford, Clayton Municipal Airport, Lugo and Baker Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
